divs: Sighting DetailsTurned off rt 41 in 1970 impala with friend to urinate, after hunting in area- noticed strange series of lights just hovering in sky- upon trying to get closer view- vehicle was shut down- and hovering objects approached our vehicle- besides the triangles their were bell shaped objects also- also off in distant horizon was cigar shaped vehicle-- triangles their were 6-8 came down 1 by 1 as if to check us out- 1 was hovering off to our south side about 400yrds and a tether line with a series off tube shaped objects was dangling in the wind on the end of it- but the 1 that got the closest i,ll never forget it came at us out of the hoizon and shut off all it,s light,s except for the front i guess i,ll call it cockpit- and it was looking at us as intently as we were trying to look at it and as it reached the point directly over our vehicle i rolled down the window stuck my head out and looked directly at its massive system of louvers, best i could describe as smacking in unison all over the bottom of the ship in all directions in unisun, but simaltainesly, very beutiful view of technology and grace- have much more info but I.m not really I prolific writer have no reason to lie- when they finally ended what i guess i.ll call their show our vehicle started up again and we proceeded home told people and became laughing stocks-- my belief is the real Mccoy.s only expose themselves or vehicles to certain people-- why--not sure -- because I have had other sightings with witnesses including a fireball with 2 smaller balls that looked like it was assisting the fire ball in in its flight right over a busy interstate.

Summary: triangle with 1 point cut off-- shut vehicle down-- close view - had elaborate system of louvers slapping in precise order
